dict.string: <key>NSAppTransportSecurity</key> <dict> <key>NSAllowsArbitraryLoads</key> <true/> <!-- For more targeted approach, use the following instead --> <!-- <key>NSExceptionDomains</key> <dict> <key>35.221.4.98</key> <dict> <key>NSExceptionAllowsInsecureHTTPLoads</key> <true/> <key>NSIncludesSubdomains</key> <true/> </dict> </dict> --> </dict>
